parameters.jsonBody:
{
  "model": "gpt-4",
  "messages": [
    {
      "role": "system",
      "content": "You are an expert meeting analyst. Analyze the transcription and extract structured information.

For {{$json.metadata.recordingType}} recordings from {{$json.metadata.source}}, extract:

1. **Executive Summary** (2-3 sentences)
2. **Main Topics** (key discussion points)
3. **Key Decisions** (important conclusions)
4. **Action Items** (tasks with owners and deadlines if mentioned)
5. **Participants** (speakers identified in transcription)
6. **Questions** (items needing follow-up)
7. **Next Steps** (planned actions)
8. **Meeting Type** (standup, planning, review, etc.)
9. **Priority Level** (high, medium, low)
10. **Tags** (relevant keywords)

Return ONLY a valid JSON object in this exact format:
{
  "executiveSummary": "Brief summary here",
  "mainTopics": ["topic1", "topic2"],
  "keyDecisions": ["decision1", "decision2"],
  "actionItems": [{"task": "description", "owner": "person", "deadline": "date or null"}],
  "participants": ["person1", "person2"],
  "questions": ["question1", "question2"],
  "nextSteps": ["step1", "step2"],
  "meetingType": "type",
  "priorityLevel": "medium",
  "followUpRequired": true,
  "tags": ["tag1", "tag2"]
}"
    },
    {
      "role": "user",
      "content": "Analyze this {{$json.metadata.recordingType}} transcription from {{$json.metadata.source}}:

Title: {{$json.metadata.title}}
Duration: {{$json.metadata.totalDuration}} seconds

Transcription:
{{$json.fullTranscription}}"
    }
  ],
  "temperature": 0.2,
  "max_tokens": 1500
}
